title: How to Make a Video Call on iPhone or iPad

steps.title: Open the FaceTime app on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open the FaceTime app on your iPhone or iPad. The FaceTime icon looks like a white video camera on a green background. You can find it on your home screen, or in an app folder.

steps.title: Tap the Video tab at the top.
steps.content: Tap the Video tab at the top. This will open a list of all your recent video calls.

steps.title: Tap the search bar at the top.
steps.content: Tap the search bar at the top. The search bar is labeled "Enter name, email, or number" at the top of your recent calls list. You can search your contacts here.

steps.title: Enter your contact's name, email address, or phone number.
steps.content: Enter your contact's name, email address, or phone number. This will search all the contacts in your phonebook, and list all the matching results.

steps.title: Tap the video camera icon next to your contact's name.
steps.content: Tap the video camera icon next to your contact's name. This will start a video call with your selected contact. Wait for them to answer, and enjoy your video call.

steps.title: Open the Messenger app on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open the Messenger app on your iPhone or iPad. The Messenger icon looks like a blue speech bubble with a white thunderbolt in it. You can find it on your home screen, or in an app folder.

steps.title: Tap the People tab at the bottom.
steps.content: Tap the People tab at the bottom. This button looks like two figureheads in the lower-left corner of your screen. It will open your contact list.

steps.title: Tap the contact you want to call.
steps.content: Tap the contact you want to call. Find the contact you want to video call on the list, and tap their name. This will open a chat conversation between you and your selected contact.

steps.title: Tap the video camera icon on the top-right.
steps.content: Tap the video camera icon on the top-right. You can find this button in the upper-right corner of your chat conversation. It will start a video call with your contact.

steps.title: Open the Google Duo app on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open the Google Duo app on your iPhone or iPad. The Duo icon looks like a blue bubble and a white video camera. You can find it on your home screen, or in an app folder.

steps.title: Tap the icon.
steps.content: Tap the icon. You can switch between video and audio calls in the middle of your screen. If you want to switch to audio calls, tap the icon.

steps.title: Swipe up from the bottom of your screen.
steps.content: Swipe up from the bottom of your screen. This will open your contact list in full-screen.

steps.title: Tap the contact you want to video call.
steps.content: Tap the contact you want to video call. Find the contact you want to video chat, and tap their name. This will ring your contact for a video call.

steps.title: Open the Viber app on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open the Viber app on your iPhone or iPad. The Viber app looks like a purple icon with a white telephone and speech bubble in it. You can find it on your home screen, or in an app folder.

steps.title: Tap the Chats tab on the bottom-left.
steps.content: Tap the Chats tab on the bottom-left. This button looks like a speech bubble icon in the lower-left corner of your screen. It will open a list of your recent chats. Alternatively, you can tap Contacts here and open your contact list.

steps.title: Tap the person you want to video call.
steps.content: Tap the person you want to video call. Find the person you want to call on your Chats or Contacts page, and tap their name. This will open a chat conversation between you and your contact.

steps.title: Tap the video camera icon on the top-right.
steps.content: Tap the video camera icon on the top-right. This button is located in the upper-right corner of your screen. It will start your video call, and ring the Viber app on your contact's phone or tablet.
